review_blob:
A- lots citrus, floral, a little booze. 
App- black with brownish red edging head is off white. 
Taste- wow hops shine bright. Little bit of roasty chocolate notes citrus is very present.
Pal- med/heavy. Solid carbonation
Overall- awesome beer hops dominate but theres still a touch of roastyness the aroma is great.

A- malty spicy, resiny, citrus.  App-golden clear white head. Taste-, bready, citrus, spruce with a malt presence. Pal- med body, nice carbonation. Over- well balanced well made beer wasn?t real bitter but u could still get a lot of hoppy citrus flavors.
